desc: Senpai, your Girl has unlocked Elite Skills, let me show you this new feature~
Tap here to view her Elite Skills~
Here's the current effect of the skill, you can tap on different skill icons to check it out~
Here's the preview of the Elite Upgraded skill
You will need to spend Standard Files and Exclusive Files for the upgrade
You can reset your Girl's upgraded Elite Skills with Gems by tapping here
Tap here to check the rules. You can find the answers to your questions here!
